actions.text: Amendment SA 138 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 65.

Amendment SA 138 proposed by Senator Isakson. (consideration: CR S2282-2283; text: CR S2282) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to establishing a biennial budget and appropriations process.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 138 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 65.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 138 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 65.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 138 proposed by Senator Isakson.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to establishing a biennial budget and appropriations process.
